title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - 40th anniversary update now available
description:
A few hours ago the 40th anniversary update for flight simulator was made available which also includes Sim Update 11. This update will add a bunch of new aircrafts, legacy airport, heli-ports and glider airports as well as several old missions from previous versions of MSFS (mainly FSX and 2004). 

In this video we will go through the release notes and then continue to install the update. Once the update is installed we will go through all the changes after the installation.
